scripts.build: npm run build --workspace=packages/ttt-api && npm run build --workspace=packages/ttt-web
scripts.docker:rebuild: docker compose down && docker compose up --build -d
scripts.docker:clean: docker system prune -f && docker volume prune -f
scripts.db:migrate: docker compose exec api node ace migration:run
scripts.db:seed: docker compose exec api node ace db:seed
scripts.db:reset: docker compose exec api node ace migration:rollback --batch=0 && docker compose exec api node ace migration:run
scripts.db:status: docker compose exec api node ace migration:status
